preparation.raw_text:
1. In a clean glass container, measure 15.00 g of chromium(III) oxide.  
 2. Add 15.00 g of potassium carbonate to the container.  
 3. Carefully measure 5.00 g of sodium hydroxide and add it to the mixture.  
 4. Gradually add 50.00 g of distilled water while stirring continuously until a smooth slurry forms.
